conversations.content:
I'll be arriving in London on March 15th. Last year, I stayed at the 'London Luxury Hotel', which had amazing reviews and ratings. It was super quiet and clean, and my room had a view of the Thames River. It was such a great experience! This time, I want to try out a new hotel. Once I figure out which one is the best, I'll head there and then find a good restaurant to eat at with my friends.
I have a budget of 160 for the hotel, and I want to stay in a hotel with the highest rating. Can you recommend a hotel? Tell me the name, rating, price range, and address. Thanks a bunch!

<function_thought>
To fulfill the user's request about hotel recommendations in London, the first step will be to gather all available hotels in the city. Once I have that list, I can then check for hotels within the user's budget and return the one with the highest rating. I will start with the `get_all_hotels_in_city` function to get the data I need.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_hotels_in_city(city="London")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

Hotel Names: Cozy Stay
Mom's Home
London Luxury
Covent Garden Retreat
Riverside View

<function_thought>
I have obtained a list of hotels in London, which includes "Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat", and "Riverside View". The next step is to retrieve the prices of these hotels to find those that fall within the user's budget of 160. After that, I can check the ratings and reviews for these hotels to identify the highest-rated option.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_hotels_prices(hotel_names=["Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat", "Riverside View"])]</function_call>

- Riverside View: 200.0 - 350.0

Since the Riverside View hotel is above the user's budget of 160, I will only consider the other hotels. Now, I need to check the ratings and reviews for the remaining hotels to determine which one has the highest rating.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_rating_reviews_for_hotels(hotel_names=["Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat"])]</function_call>
